Package ui.game.menu

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExitButton
    An ExitButton with defaults for use in a GameMenu.
    A button that exits the program.
    GameMenu
    Represents the main game menu.
    Represents a menu containing a list of selectable menu items.
    Represents a bordered box with a section in the top and a row of buttons at the bottom.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    GameMenu.EscapeHandler
    An escape handler that exits to this menu.
    GameStartButton
    Starts a new game.
    Represents a selectable button.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Player
    Represents a player in the context of the game menu.
